title: Clawson House
posting_body: ['There Are Many Great Things About This House.', 'Completely updated', 'New paint, upstairs and downstairs', 'New flooring, new carpet', 'New fixtures in bathroom and kitchen', 'New stove and refrigerator', 'All new led lighting and wall sockets and switches', '3 - Bedroom 2 - Full Bath, Living Room And  Kitchen With Eating Area.', 'Very Cute,', 'Large Open Tiled Basement.', ' Central Air Conditioning And  Hi Efficiency Heating Unit.', 'Appliances Include New Refrigerator, New Stove, And Washer & Dryer.', 'Also, Cable- TV And Phone-Ready', 'Large Fenced In Yard. 1 1/2 Car Garage.', 'Outdoors Services Include:', 'Lawn Service, Cuts Lawn and Edges and Keep A Nice Look', 'Snow Removal, Shoveling Of The Side Walk', 'And Walk Way And Driveway Of House', 'Real Plus!!', 'For The People On The Go', 'Water for the house is included', 'Clawson school system achieves for all', 'Clawson is a low crime area with great police', 'And city services', 'Standard one year lease agreement, for $2,300.00 a month', 'Pets are allowed.', 'For and  additional $1000.00 dollars paid up front for the year.', 'Clawson is a great place for families as well as young adults--close to shopping and restaurants/bars.', '🔥🔥Basic Requirements to Qualify🔥🔥**:', '• Annual household income of $40,000+', '• Credit Score']
